title: YouTube’s free with ads catalog of movies adding nearly 4,000 TV episodes
content:
Since 2018, YouTube has offered a collection of free-to-watch movies that are supported by advertising. That YouTube library in the US is now expanding to TV shows with almost 4,000 free episodes.

more…

The post YouTube’s free with ads catalog of movies adding nearly 4,000 TV episodes  appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Since 2018, YouTube has offered a catalog of free-to-watch movies. YouTube's collection in the US is now adding 100 free TV shows...
